metadata.title: Domain Enrichment - DomainTools Iris Investigate
metadata.description: Given a domain or set of domains associated with an incident return all Iris Investigate data for those domains as comments in the incident.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

body.message:
DomainTools IRIS Investigate response for:@{variables('domain_name')}
@{replace(replace(replace(body('Domain_detailts_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Domain_Risk_Score_Components_Table') , '"', ''),']','') , '[', '') }@{replace(replace(replace(body('miscellaneouos_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('IP_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('MX_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Nameserver_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('SSL_Info_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Admin_Contact_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Billing_Contact_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Registrant_Contact_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}@{replace(replace(replace(body('Technical_Contact_Table'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'),'"','')}


Find more details: https://research.domaintools.com/iris/search/?q=@{variables('domain_name')}
